title: Happy Ending of a Male-Dressed Noble - Novel Updates
genre: Gender Bender   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
author: しきみ彰
description:
Adele was a young mistress, heir to a Marquis, who likes to dress as a man.

That girl has a fiancee named Celis.

As she couldn’t keep silent anymore, Adele told her that she was a woman and said, [Let’s break this engagement]

After that, Celis replied, [To be honest, I’m also a man.]

And so, their gender reversal love story began.>
